驒字的基本解释

驒
tuó
毛色呈鳞状斑纹的青马。

驒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuó］
［《廣韻》徒河切，平歌，定。］
［《廣韻》徒干切，平寒，定。］
毛色呈鳞状斑纹的马。
[②]［diān］
［《廣韻》都年切，平先，端。］
见“驒2騱”。
[③]［tān］
［《集韻》他干切，平寒，透。］
见“驒3驒”。

驒字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驒； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1445第19
【集韻】【正韻】?唐何切，音駝。【說文】驒騱，野馬也。　又一曰靑驪白鱗，文如鼉魚。【爾雅·釋畜】靑驪驎驒。【韓詩】【字林】皆曰白馬黑髦。或曰卽連錢驄。【詩·魯頌】有驒有駱。【註】靑驪，鱗色淺深，似魚鱗班駁，今連錢驄。　又【廣韻】徒干切，音壇。【集韻】他干切，音灘。又都黎切，音低。義?同。　又【廣韻】都年切【集韻】多年切，?音顚。【廣韻】驒騱，畜似馬而小。

驒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
驒字的起名意思

暂无。

驒
Basic explanation of words
驒
tuó
A green horse with scaly markings.
驒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuó］
["Guangyun" Tu Heqi, Ping Ge, Ding. ]
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, calm and fixed. ]
A horse with scaly markings.
[②]［diān］
["Guangyun" is cut every year, level first, end. ]
See "驒2騱".
[③]［tān］
["Ji Yun" he cuts dry, calm and thorough. ]
See "驒3驒".
驒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　驒; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1445 Page 19
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Tang Heqie, sound camel. [Said the text] Xi, wild horses too.　Another one said that the white scales are like 靑骊鼍鼍鼍鼍. 【Erya·Shiyu】Qianqianqian. [Han Poems] [Word Forest] They are all called white horses and black fashions. Or 卽lian Qian Cong. 【Poetry·Lu Song】There is a roe and there is a roe. [Note] Qianli, the scales are light and dark, like fish scales, today even money 骢.　[Guangyun] Discretionary, sound world. [Jiyun] He cuts dry, Yintan. Li Qie again, the voice is low. Righteous? Same.　[Guangyun] are cut every year [Jiyun] cut for many years,? Sound. [Guangyun] The horse is like a horse but small.
